content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 May 2019Zalora points - Krisflyer or NTUC Linkpoints?With krisflyer miles available on zalora, which do you guys think is more worth it?1 answerAnswerBump1

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 May 2019It depends on whether fits into your overall lifestyle.If you are miles chaser, Krisflyer miles will be an obvious choice. If you are on team cashback, NTUC Linkpoints is definitely better as you can redeem the Linkpoints.0 comments1
